definition: flat/(coll.) to beat (sb) up/old variant of 匾[bian3]
green beans in sauce, popular Beijing dish

sentences.english: Most granules of haricot starch are like horse bean, and the surface is smooth.
sentences.chinese: 对扁豆淀粉颗粒特性和糊化特性进行了研究。

sentences.english: In a fight to save in Bai Yang and lentils.
sentences.chinese: 在一次打架斗殴中杨林为了救白文得罪了沈庆和扁豆。

sentences.english: Add in oil, grated carrots, lentils, stock and milk.
sentences.chinese: 加入油，胡萝卜块，小扁豆，蔬菜汤和牛奶。

sentences.english: Studies on ultrastructure of tapetal development in Dolichos lablab L.
sentences.chinese: 扁豆绒毡层发育的超微结构研究。

sentences.english: Boiled lentils have about 16 grams of belly-filling fiber in every cup.
sentences.chinese: 没杯熟扁豆中含有大约16克腹部填充纤维。

sentences.english: Lily ladles little Letty's lentil soup.
sentences.chinese: 莉莉给小勒提舀了点扁豆汤。

sentences.english: All curries are served with basmati rice, chutney, pickle and papadum.
sentences.chinese: 所有咖喱菜配香米饭，酸辣酱，泡菜及印式扁豆煎饼。

sentences.english: Computerized Application to the Growth Trends of the Main Stems of Early Maturing Dolichos Lablab L.
sentences.chinese: 扁豆特早熟品种主茎生长动态的计算机应用。

sentences.english: Cooked lentils also contain 27 percent more folate per cup than cooked spinach does.
sentences.chinese: 在每杯中，熟扁豆也比熟菠菜多含有27%的叶酸。

sentences.english: Guards brought uss large plate of rice smothered with a lentil stew.
sentences.chinese: 卫兵给我们端来一大盘子扁豆焖饭。

sentences.english: Add lentils, chicken bouillon and water to the skillet.
Eat more beans, lentils, seeds, nuts and whole grains.
sentences.chinese: 多吃豆类，小扁豆，种子，坚果和粗粮。

sentences.english: Maybe a spicy sauce made of lentils could wake up your taste buds!
sentences.chinese: 也许加一点扁豆做的辣酱会唤起你的食欲。

sentences.english: Different fertilization levels had no effect on the prophase yield of Dolichos lablab L.
sentences.chinese: 不同施肥水平对扁豆品种前期产量没有影响。

sentences.english: Bring back to a simmer, cover and simmer 30 minutes or until the lentils and vegetables are tender.
sentences.chinese: 在拿回来焖30分钟，直到扁豆和蔬菜变脆。

sentences.english: Include dried beans (like kidney or pinto beans) and lentils into your meals.
sentences.chinese: 多吃豆类，包括干豆类和小扁豆。

definition: variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
